roleset.name: label, call
roleset.note: IDENTIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'identify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'label' et al. I wonder if that *trace-2* really should be in there, but that's thechain that treebank provides. (from identify.01-v)
IDENTIFICATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to identify.01. VN class characterize-29.2-1-1. Framed by Katie. (from identification.01-n)

example.name: passivized, with LONG trace chain
example.text: ``We're being paid today, but we're worried about tomorrow and will want'' letters of credit, says the sales director at one major dress maker who *trace-1*-2 asked *trace-2*-3 not to be identified *trace-3*.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: ``A lot of people are identifying a vote for representation as a vote against Fred Smith,'' says J.X. Gollich, a Tiger-turned-Federal pilot and union activist.
example.arg: as a vote against Fred Smith

example.name: Another arg 1 only
example.text: earlier identification of emerging financial crises

roleset.name: feel empathy
roleset.note: IDENTIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'identify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'label' et al. (from identify.02-v predicate notes)
IDENTIFICATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to identify.02. Vn class empathize-88.2. Framed by Katie. (from identification.02-n)

example.text: John identified with the lonely monkey at the zoo.

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: The victim's identification with the attacker
